alert.note: Alert for Barry; Lawrence; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 5:38AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Stone, northeastern Barry and southeastern Lawrence Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 537 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Verona, or 7 miles southwest of Aurora, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monett, Aurora, Marionville, Crane, Purdy, Verona, Hurley, Chesapeake, Mcdowell, Pleasant Ridge, Wheelerville and Madry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southwestern Missouri.
